tasks: Developed and maintained high-traffic real estate platforms for various international markets.
Implemented responsive frontend features using ReactJS and CSS.
Designed and built scalable backend services using PHP and Ruby on Rails.
Created and maintained RESTful APIs to support frontend functionality.
Managed and optimized relational databases with MySQL and PostgreSQL.
Ensured high code quality and reliability through unit tests and TDD.
Used Jest, PHPUnit, and RSpec for comprehensive test coverage.
Worked in Agile teams: participated in sprint planning, stand-ups, and retrospectives.
Practiced clean code principles, refactoring, pair programming, and hexagonal architecture.
Built interactive 3D applications with Unity and C#.
Designed and programmed dynamic Canvas-based UIs.
Developed intuitive UI interactions for VR applications.
Performed hands-on testing and reported bugs for continuous improvements.
Quickly adapted to new frameworks and tools, demonstrating a strong learning curve.

projects.title: To Be A Traveller
projects.description: A social travel platform where users can share and explore custom itineraries, and showcase the cities they've visited. Designed to inspire and connect travelers from around the world.

projects.title: CSV Manager
projects.description: User-friendly platform to upload, search, and manage CSV data with features like real-time filtering and pagination. Built to simplify CSV workflows for non-technical users.

projects.title: Geodata Dashboard
projects.description: An interactive dashboard for visualizing geospatial data. Aimed at non-technical users like public administrators and decision-makers to support informed urban planning.

projects.title: Resume Printable
projects.description: Responsive digital resume that maintains its layout and style when printed directly from any browser. Optimized for a clean, professional presentation in both digital and paper formats.
